channel.title: Remaking Runescape
channel.description:
Yes, this does have something to do with my old thread about servers.
Why do we try and remake Runescape? It was a game that we used to love (or some may still love it) that is now on the verge of dieing. Some may disagree, but that's not the point, the point is that allot of people miss the early days of the game.
After taking several surveys, however, most people don't really want the game to be remade. The time it would take to not only train their character again, but also get an economy started would take years. We can obviously can get around this with EXP rates, etc, but then it doesn't seem like Runescape anymore. 75% of the people I asked said they wouldn't have the time to do it again. Plus, the large, vast community of hundreds of thousands wouldn't exist, there would maybe be a few thousand at most because most have either quit the game for good or still play RS today.
There are allot of things to consider, but, should we really remake the game as it was, or branch off and make our own sort of game out of it?

item.title: Remaking Runescape
item.dc:creator: @oldschool-scape oldschool-scape
item.description:
@oldschool-scape wrote:

i think many ppl quit in the first few days, on rs2006.
make ur self cb 70 take’s weeks again, its not that fun anymore, only a few 100 players, and shitty eco in beginning

item.title: Remaking Runescape
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

BitchPk:

Isnt there some group bisy with rs2006, they are half way i heard ( Almost can’t belive it with all those quests )

They have barely even started quests.

OT: Obviously a lot of people still want the old rs because rs2006.net has thousands of members without a server even being online. I like a good remake but what is even better is seeing original things that no one else has created before.

Read full topic

item.title: Remaking Runescape
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

frozon566:

I’ve always thought RSPS should be used to create something original instead of always trying to emulate everything jagex does/did.

I have, to quite an extent as well. But sadly, most people don’t have the creativity.

Read full topic

item.title: Remaking Runescape
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

People will remake it because it was what they once loved to play. Most people who join rsps are people who have quit RS for one reason or another. We then get the idea to return what we believed to be the best time.

Read full topic
